Text:
steam_api.dll  you included is 16kb which means it will work only in singleplayer - no networking and no steam required (also savegames are in "out\save" folder in gamefolder not in steam folder (since steam isn't required)

To make it work in coop which requires steam you use the steam_api.dll which you included in Bin_Backup folder, 121Kb

This also misses the right language file for Russian (if you want that then get it from the demonoid torrent for update 5 patch -search there- which also has the crash-on-startup fix in game.ini - which is the "En" must be "en" instead for Locale("en") )

Also, in your instructions "To Play Co-op:" step 2:
the exe in Bin_Backup is the original one (uncracked) so it won't work, you need to use the same exe you provided when playing coop (386,560 bytes - it's actually the .exe from reloaded iso in Crack folder, though someone modified it and removed the Reloaded text inside it... some Raven group I believe) ,
for coop just need to add that 121Kb steam_api.dll rather than use the 16kb one, that's all ; the exe in Bin_Backup is for informational purposes only - so to speak :)  ie. never run that one

I've copied all files from both folders into game directory as instructed, i'm trying to run as admin but getting nowhere. Any help would be much appreciated
Thank you. For me works fine.
Re-playing singleplayer campaing.

Although this update works, it has a serious flaw that the retail version doesn't.

The level cap is now 60, however you're supposed to get higher quest XP.

With this patch, you only get the same exact quest XP as before.

So getting to level 60 takes forever, and on top of that, if you have decent weapons their stats will halve.

With the retail version, it still reduces your weapon stats (if they're high) to balance the game, but it gives you heaps more quest XP so you can easily reach 60.

EG: First few quests at the start of the game that Sinamoi gives you;

Retail: 18,000 XP
This version: 800 XP

Did not work for me 
I followed the instructions. I also installed green luma w/o any issues. 

Started up dead island and got a steam error message.. Can't play game now..


Can someone please provide some details on how to install update 5 and play online.

@Insomneac you get 18k xp when you're like close to level 60, if you were level 1 and you'd get 18k xp from the first main Sinamoi quest, you'd be up several levels just from it, since level 2 requires 2000 xp.
They did increase xp for quests, you will find yourself doing the continous quests lots because they give some serious 3-5k xp, depending on your current level.
@CuttURface you can read the first 2 comments for that

I'm getting a "steam error" titled error message saying: "application load error 5:0000065434". I copied and replaced the files as instructed and singleplayer/steamless worked fine. Now I am using the newest greenluma and the bin-backup files. Anyone figured out the problem yet?

For people getting the start up error 5:0000065434...

The problem is that whoever made this release didn't actually crack the .exe in the Bin_Backup folder.  If you use the .exe in the other folder, the game will load.

I don't know yet if this has some sort of drawback.  I do know that I started a new character, and although the Game Lobby menu IS selectable, I don't seem to be finding any other servers to join.  This may be because I simply need to get a bit farther into the game first, or it may be because of the .exe work-around.  I don't know.

See, I like this update 100x better than update 3. Update 3 makes no fucking sense, has no instructions, and makes you go googling for extra shit that wasnt included in the torrent and makes you figure all that bullshit out in order to work it.

THIS torrent is just.. Heres what it is, heres how to run it, you dont need extra crap to play offline.

Thank you Sunblock.

All other update's caused random crashes every 10-20 minutes, and even more often when I was @ the lighthouse.  I Tried disabling SLI, reinstalling OS, using old drivers, nothing helped.
